duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain pricing and create tool orders in SAP including initiation, update, tracking and issue resolution.
Work with Plant Finance and Sales to ensure timely collection of tooling and claim receivables.
Track and support commercial elements of engineering changes in Team Center.
Update cost calculations; support the commercial success of new and existing programs.
Maintain a comprehensive understanding of program bill of materials, piece price, invest, etc.
Support manufacturing and finance in all aspects of the commercial side of the business.
Support commercial program goals and tracking for EBIT, IRR and other financial targets.
Support the Commercial Manager and Troy Corporate Business Development team with quoting activities to secure profitable new business.
Maintain positive relationships with current customers utilizing and understanding specific customer’s systems and processes.
Support commercial claims with customer(s), support recovery strategy.
Maintain written records of all agreements and unresolved issues with customers.
Update project summaries and periodic commercial reports.
Support tracking and reporting relevant commercial KPI’s.
Attend customer-relevant meetings and maintain customer commercial LOPs as needed.
Maintain a working knowledge of all plant projects and production schedules.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (BA) from four-year college or university preferred
